Uses of Package
net.uniform.api

  • Packages that use net.uniform.api 
    Package Description
    net.uniform.api  
    net.uniform.html  
    net.uniform.html.decorators  
    net.uniform.html.elements  
    net.uniform.html.filters  
    net.uniform.html.formvalidators

    net.uniform.impl.translation  
  • Classes in net.uniform.api used by net.uniform.api 
    Class and Description
    Decorator
    A decorator is used to alter any previously rendered HTML, normally in order to extend it.
    Element
    An Element represents any kind of item contained in a Form Every element has an id (unique and mandatory) and a label (optional).
    Filter
    A Filter is responsible of pre-processing any value set or populated to a element.
    Form
    A Form represents an HTML form that contains elements.
    FormValidator
    A form validator is like an element validator (Validator), but is applied to the whole form.
    Renderer
    A Renderer is responsible of generating the HTML tags that represent a single Element.
    TranslationEngine
    This class is responsible of translating text resources inside any Uniform class.
    Validator
    A validator can be added to an Element to extend its validation logic.
  • Classes in net.uniform.api used by net.uniform.html 
    Class and Description
    Form
    A Form represents an HTML form that contains elements.

  • Classes in net.uniform.api used by net.uniform.html.elements 
    Class and Description
    Element
    An Element represents any kind of item contained in a Form Every element has an id (unique and mandatory) and a label (optional).
    ElementWithValueConversion
    This interface extends an Element features so it's able to override the conversion of its String values to any target type with any custom logic.
    Renderer
    A Renderer is responsible of generating the HTML tags that represent a single Element.
